heading: Endgame & Pit Push Builds Tier List
content: This Tier List defines the performance of all builds against any high-end challenges with a particular focus on pushing the to the highest tiers possible after players have unlocked their full potential with well-rolled items, aspects, uniques, tempering and masterworking. Higher ranked builds are expected to clear higher Pit Tiers more easily.

heading: Legend
content: to the highest tiers possible after players have unlocked their full potential with well-rolled items, aspects, uniques, tempering and masterworking. Higher ranked builds are expected to clear higher Pit Tiers more easily.
